abstract: Big American banks, facing anger and resentment since financial crisis, are increasing efforts, and testing new methods, to sway public opinion in their favor; executives at number of major banks admit failure in conveying benefits of large modern bank to customers.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup’s ad campaign for the Olympics showcases the benefits of large global banks, and other big banks are trying to soften their image.

headline.main: Big Banks Make a Pitch for Hearts and Minds
